headline.main: SPY SCARE IN SOFIA; Arrests Said to Spread Panic in a Drive to Stop News Leaks

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Sept. 29 -- A reign of terror is under way in Bulgaria, where a wave of executions, mass arrests and trials before courts-martial over the weekend precipitated new disorders and fresh sabotage in Sofia and the provinces, according to reports tonight from foreign diplomatic and military quarters here.
abstract: Bulgarian mil ct to try him in absentia for alleged espionage acts

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
